Research & Develop Open Ventures (RDOV)

Our Dove Crowdfund

This document is a prep for the real Indiegogo campaign. It tries to mimick the format, so that transposing it onto their website or another service will be an easy task. The dates, rewards and other details are not finalized, and may change.

About this project

Our Dove is an open source market platform. Whether you are a company looking for support from an open source expert, a startup looking for a CTO, or a new project looking for collaborators, Our Dove can help you find your match in the F/OSS community.

Consumers

  • Get expert support for your favorite projects

  • Give back to developers

Developers

  • Offer support and collaboration agreements from a badge in your README and our secure invoicing system.

  • Find sponsors to fund your future work.

  • Collaborate with other developers and projects on your own terms.

  • Outsource front-line support, so you can focus on the underlying technical issues.

Sponsors

  • Sponsor projects in return for revenue sharing

  • Funds are safe in multisignature bitcoin wallet until you sign on each project.

Technical specs (MVP)

Our Dove will be a multisignature bitcoin wallet that lets users link github projects and negotiate support and sponsorship agreements for said projects.

Deglet fork

  • Deglet is an open source, multisig wallet
  • React.js, a modern javascript framework
  • Bitcore
  • Sponsors and Mentors will be able to create 2 of 2 wallets for managing incubator funds.

Github integration

  • Link accounts
  • Verify project ownership/commits
  • Interactive Badges for showing support, sponsorship options in README files.

Agreements

  • default Support and Sponsorship agreement templates
  • Mentors and Sponsors configure and offer agreements
    • Can find each other and accept/negotiate sponsorship agreements.
  • New and existing projects
    • Apply for sponsorships
    • Apply for support services

Directory

  • Find and research open source projects
  • Find project maintainers, and incubators
  • Find support and sponsorships for projects

Coinapult

  • Coinapult will be integrated to allow Our Dove users to convert BTC balances to fiat when desirable.

Finance

Crowdfunding Target Goal

$50,000

Estimated to be split 70:20:10 respectively between developing the Our Dove app, comissioning solid but configurable default legal agreements, and rewarding campaign supporters. This target is for a Minimum Viable Product (MVP). It will have all of the basic features for individuals to use Our Dove for simple agreements, but may not fit the needs of larger and more complex projects.

Stretch Goals

$75,000 - Github deep integration (issue tracker, commit tags, contributer scores)

$100,000 - Crypto Capital integration (fiat-denominated sponsorships)

$150,000 - m of n wallets for organizing Accountants, Arbitrators, and software teams

$200,000 - Allow custom support and sponsorship agreements to be submitted

$250,000 - Front-line Support outsourcing for projects

$300,000 - Hosting and DevOps oursourcing for projects

$400,000 - Explore ways to support other types of agreements and sponsorships such as for artistic collaboration, hardware or general microfinance.

$500,000 - Our Dove will use half of these excess funds to create sponsorships designed to make Our Dove more useful. Supporters will choose which projects to sponsor, and how much the sponsorship grant will be for each. Then the Our Dove management will manage the applicants and all maintainence of the sponsorships. For example, a sponsorship could be created to grant $5000 to any team that creates a plugin for Our Dove to a commercial CRM, Support, or accounting platform. Teams would apply and develop the software, and the Our Dove management would review the applications and reward sponsorship grants.

$1,000,000 - User records, Agreements, sponsorships, and other centralized aspects of Our Dove moved onto a blockchain. Full decentralization, if possible on the budget.

Rewards

All are cumulative.

$1 - thank you tweet

$5 - Beta program

$10 - Contributor file/list

$25 - T shirts

$100 - “Founding Mentor” on ourdove.com

$250 - See Legal agreement drafts

$1,000 - Personal help registering and configuring your mentor/sponsor account before public launch

$2,500 - 2 hours of Technical consulting from Deginner.

$5,000 - 1 day of Technical consulting from Deginner.

$10,000 - “Founding Sponsor” on ourdove.com

Team

Person Company Title Description
Cindy Zimmerman Our Dove CEO Manage Our Dove operations, marketing, finances, etc.
Ira Miller Deginner Co-Founder Creator of the Research & Develop Open Ventures business model. Advisor and developer for Our Dove.
Guilherme Polo Deginner Co-Founder Primary developer of the Deglet app which will be the backbone of ourdove.com. Architect and Engineering manager for Our Dove project.

The Our Dove team consists of a partnership between two organizations: open source software development firm Deginner and a newly formed company Our Dove.

Deginner is a pure R & D firm. Though the business model that inspires Our Dove (RDOV) and the software stack that will run it (Deglet) originate with Deginner, all operations will be managed by the Our Dove company.

Deginner has offered to develop and provide long term support for the Our Dove platform. In addition, Deginner will donate some of the crowdfunding rewards. Deginner is motivated to expand use of the RDOV model, and looks forward to collaborating with other R & D teams using the Our Dove platform.

Cindy Zimmerman was chosen as CEO for Our Dove because of her technical and managerial background, as well as her passion for collaborative business. Her extensive network in private, public and academic software circles will be instrumental in attracting the diverse and high-quality users that Our Dove needs to thrive.

Partners

Our Dove will be integrated with a number of third party services that will add value for the users. Providing these sorts of value adds are the main way that the Our Dove company intends to monetize the service in the long term.

Coinapult

Coinapult is a Bitcoin payment processor established in 2012 by Deginner Co-Founder Ira Miller. Coinapult will provide low-cost currency conversions for Our Dove users who wish to avoid exchange rate volatility.

Crypto Capital

Crypto Capital is a government regulated financial institution with the ability to transmit money around the world. Our Dove users will optionally be able to use Crypto Capital to deposit and withdraw money via the banking system. Crypto Capital also offers prepaid visa cards, which Our Dove members can purchase.

Support outsourcing (TBD)

We expect a significant percentage of Our Dove mentors to be individuals or small teams. These may not be well equipped for front-line support, due to limited availability and training. Our Dove hopes to partner with a support outsourcing firm to provide front-line support on a package by package basis. The support agents will be trained to use github issue trackers and will look for bug reports or create new ones based on user feedback.

Developer Operations outsourcing (TBD)

Hosting and more generalized Developer Operations are a common and valuable sevice to provide for a project. By partnering with hosting and DevOps specialists, Our Dove will facillitate easy outsourcing of these services.

Corporate services outsourcing (TBD)

Some projects may grow to the point where they begin to have complex operations and require corporate services. Our Dove will try to identify and make available high-quality corporate services for the users.

Stretch Development

If the campaign reaches one or more stretch goals, these will be added sequentially after the MVP launch.

Resources

Media to integrate into the campaign and Our Dove marketing materials.

Our Dove Videos

Use goanimate to do these videos ourselves. As the topic is complex, and the animation does not need to be amazing, this is actually the most efficient time-wise and will cost very little.

Name target length description
Our Dove crowdfunding 3 min. Lifecycle of a support then support/sponsorship agreement. Highlights how easy it is to monetize open source projects. Turn your github project into bitcoin today! Advertise our crowdsale
Our Dove for Developers 1 min. How developers and project maintainers can use Our Dove.
Our Dove for Consumers 1 min. How consumers can use Our Dove to shop for open source projects and related services.
Our Dove for Sponsors 1 min. How sponsors can use and get repaid for sponsoring open source projects on Our Dove.

Legal

Licensing

All software developed by or on behalf of Our Dove will use the MIT license.

All legal and technical documents developed by or on behalf of Our Dove will use CC by 4.0.

Our Dove will give preference to open source partners.

Disclaimers

The Our Dove corporation is a for-profit company. It’s planned business model and relationships are provided for transparency. No equity or monetary returns are promised for crowdfunding supporters.

Deginner is also a for-profit corporation, and has a revenue sharing agreement with Our Dove in return for long term support.

Our Dove is not responsible for legal contracts users enter into with each other. The Our Dove Support and Sponsorship Agreements will be created by objective legal experts and maintained with community support. The Agreements are not a reflection or recommendation of the Our Dove corporation, nor the software maintainers.

Our Dove and Deginner provide all software without guarantee or liability for potential losses. Backing up and securing multisignature bitcoin wallet keys are the responsibility of the user.
